settings.text: It's NOT just a T-shirt. Our premium tees are designed for guys’ bodies. They accentuate the arms & shoulders to make you stand out and feel great. They're also super soft, wash well and reasonably priced.

settings.question: {{ collection.title }}
settings.paragraph: Every guy looks great in classic crew necks. They flatter the arms, chest, and back. And if you pick the right shirt, it’ll last you a lifetime. Try our crews with pockets or without them. Also available in long sleeve crews.

settings.question: TRUE CLASSIC’S CREW NECK T-SHIRT FEATURES
settings.paragraph: All of our classic, slim fit crew neck tees are fitted and sized to flatter your body — no matter what shape or size. That’s because we know the difference between an ok shirt and a great shirt — it’s all in how a shirt sits on your arms and shoulders. Plus, we put a lot of work into making sure our shirts won’t shrink and your back won’t itch (our shirts are tagless). Our cotton crew neck t shirt are perfectly balanced with polyester for a slim fitted crew.

settings.question: OUR MOST POPULAR CREWS
settings.paragraph: Keep it simple with the essential white crew or black crew neck shirt. You can purchase crew 3 packs of the basics or our staple 6 pack of crews, so your wardrobe has a foundation to build on.
